channel.title: Posts on The world beyond Linux
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The world beyond Linux

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello there, this is my first blog post. Let me first start by saying a few words about myself, my name is Bram Oosterlynck and I was born in Belgium. In my free time I like to do a lot of stuff, camping, hiking, road trips, etc. But this blog will be about something else I love doing in my free time. I love playing around with technology, and that is what this blog will be about.
